clickhide_instructions.message: After closing this popup, click (or right-click) an element on the page.

description.message: Used on over 100 million devices, Adblock Plus is the world's most popular ad blocker.

disabled_for_these_domains.message: Adblock Plus is disabled for the domains listed below. You can add a domain either via the Adblock Plus icon in the address bar or by typing the domain (not a URL) in the box and clicking the "Add domain" button.

enable_only_the.message: Enable only the filter lists you need. Too many can make your browser unresponsive.

filter_must_follow_syntax.message: Your filter must follow the Adblock Plus filter syntax.

found_a_bug.message: Found a bug? Want to translate Adblock Plus into your language? Please file a request here.

invalid_css_selector.message: $selector$ is not a valid CSS selector

notification_open_all.message: Open all links from this notification

notification_with_buttons.message: Click 'OK' to open all links in this notification.

notification_without_buttons.message: Click on the notification to open all links in it.

show_devtools_panel.message: Show 'Adblock Plus' panel in the developer tools

stats_share_message.message: I blocked $number$ ads and trackers thanks to Adblock Plus.

subscriptionSelection_subscriptionSelect.message: Please choose a filter subscription from the list:

unexpected_filter_list_header.message: Filter list headers aren't allowed here
